home.title: Asteractive - Construction & Engineering Excellence
home.description: Specializing in construction, contracting, and integrated engineering systems with innovation, precision, and reliability.
home.ogDescription: Delivering turnkey solutions that combine quality, safety, and smart technology.

hero.title: We Build and Shape the Future
hero.subtitle: We specialize in construction, contracting, and integrated engineering systems, bringing innovation, precision, and reliability to every project we deliver.

about_home.title: Solutions for a Sustainable Future
about_home.paragraph1: From general contracting and civil works to fire alarm systems, HVAC, and generators, our mission is to create safe, efficient, and sustainable environments that stand the test of time.
about_home.paragraph2: With a dedicated team of professionals and a commitment to international standards, we deliver lasting partnerships based on trust and excellence.

services_home.title: Our Core Services
services_home.card1_desc: Full-scale general contracting, from excavation and foundations to structural works and finishing.
services_home.card2_desc: Supply and installation of generators, transformers, distribution panels, and high/medium voltage lines.
services_home.card3_desc: Advanced CCTV, fire alarm systems, and specialized kitchen hood fire suppression.
services_home.card4_desc: Installation of building sound systems, conference audio, and simultaneous translation systems.

benefits_home.title: Why Choose Us?
benefits_home.card1_desc: We adhere to the highest quality standards, from design to delivery, to ensure all desired outcomes are achieved.
benefits_home.card2_desc: We place great importance on applying health and safety standards on all work sites to ensure a safe, accident-free environment.
benefits_home.card3_desc: We are committed to delivering projects on time without delays, with accurate schedules and constant progress monitoring.
benefits_home.card4_desc: Our strength lies in our people. We have a specialized team of highly skilled engineers and technicians with continuous training.

cta_final.title: Let's Build Something Great
cta_final.subtitle: Have a question or want to discuss a project? Contact us directly or send us a message to get a detailed consultation.

footer.about: A leading firm in electrical, mechanical, and construction fields, committed to executing projects with quality, safety, and smart technology.
